title: go 1.5.1 bug?
body:
package main 

    import "fmt"
 
    func main() {
       a := []int{0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7}
       b := a[0:3]
       b = append(b, 9)
       b = append(b, a[3:]...)
       fmt.Println(b)
     }
    output: b = [0 1 2 9 9 4 5 6 7] 
    want: b = [0 1 2 9 3 4 5 6 7]
